byline.original: By DAVID W. CHEN and RAYMOND HERNANDEZ

snippet: John C. Liu, the city comptroller, said he would investigate irregularities in campaign gifts, but insisted there had been no wrongdoing.
lead_paragraph: John C. Liu, the city comptroller, said he would investigate irregularities in campaign gifts, but insisted there had been no wrongdoing.

headline.main: Questioned on Donations, Comptroller Vows Review
headline.print_headline: Questioned on Donations, Comptroller Vows Review
headline.seo: John C. Liu Vows Review of Fund-Raising Irregularities
